Pre-Game Insights: India will play their first 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup group game on June 5 against Ireland in New York.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The entire T20 World Cup, including India's warm-up game against Bangladesh, will be broadcast live in India on Star Sports and streamed on Disney+ Hotstar.
Others: The 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup will be co-hosted by the West Indies and the United States from June 1 to 29 June 2024.
Team India will be aiming for their second T20 title.
